I am looking for the following Sov 460's in G-VG condition.  Prefer raw, however, graded is ok.  If interested in selling, please send scans/prices to [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url].  I have added my buy price on the remaining cards that I need to complete the subset.

Chance, Frank (Portrait - Yellow) ~ $1000-$1500 Poor
Chase, Hal (Portrait - Blue) ~ $500 Good
Cobb, Ty (Portrait - Red) ~ $1500-$2000 Poor
Evers, Johnny (Chicago On Shirt-Yellow) ~ $250 Good
McGraw (Portrait - With Cap) ~ $150 Good

Thanks,

Tom
